seo.title: Monterosso Maps 2025 | Village & Hiking Trail Maps
seo.description: Detailed maps of Monterosso al Mare. Village layout, hiking trails, beaches, restaurants, and key landmarks for easy navigation.

body.title: Monterosso Maps & Navigation
body.subtitle: Detailed maps to help you navigate Monterosso's two districts, find beaches, restaurants, and connect to hiking trails.

features.title: Village Layout
features.description: Old Town and Fegina districts with key landmarks marked.

features.title: Hiking Trails
features.description: Detailed trail maps to Vernazza and Sanctuary of Soviore.

features.title: Beach Locations
features.description: Both beaches with access points and facilities.

features.title: Restaurants & Cafes
features.description: Dining options plotted throughout both districts.

features.title: Transportation
features.description: Train station, bus stops, and parking locations.

features.title: Points of Interest
features.description: Churches, towers, viewpoints, and historic sites.
